text: enam nidahasa thibimata nam siyallata pera dewalwalata apa banda thabana damaya binda damiya yuthuya.

(ki)midumkaruwan wisin aathmaya namathi sagarayen udata ragena enu labana adbhutha mathsyayange chayarupa pradarshanayaka narambaannan bawata pathwi sitina makswadi wicharaya, dhanapathi panthiye praharawalin kalawa aaraksha karana athare ha kala nirmanayehi ananyathawa wenuwen katayuthu karana athare manushyayage drawyamaya jiwithaya saha aathmaya athara me wana wita bindi gos athi samathulithathawa yali prathishtapanaya kirimata prayathna dariya yuthu ya.”

aadi shishya tharaga wayasa awurudu 40 ta wadi kridakayan athara kriyathmaka wana athara ehidi shri lankawe pradhana krikat tharagawaliya krida karana kridakayanta ema wayas simawa ikmawa sitiyada tharagawaliyata sahabhagi wiya nohaki bawa sanwidhayaka mandalaya pawasayi.

redi wiwime yanthaya saha redi katime rodaya gruhastha redi wiyannange welada mewalam wu athara ema yanthara rata pura rakiya awasatha sapayu wada kadinam karana kiyakarakamak wiya. 18 wana shathawarshayedi lom bhanda apanayanaya bithanyaya mulu apanayanayen 1/4 katath wadi wu athara, 1701-1770 athara kalaye ema pamanaya deguna wiya.

mata 2009 mulma janadhipathi sammanaya labune.eda kusalatha purna wes natum shilpiya sammanaya himi wuna.piliwelin 2010,2011,2012,2013 ha 2014 mata me sammanaya labuna.2015 wasare kumbaal perahara nima wela bayisikalayen gedara yana kota anathurak wuna.eeken mage urahisa langa asthiya binduna.ee nisa ee wasare peraharata sambandha wenna bariwuna.2016,2017 ha 2018 di mata wishishtathama wes natum shilpiyata himi sammanaya laba ganna puluwan wuna yayi ki ya.
